data.persona: My family is my reason for being. My kids and my wife are all I have. This village is all we know in this crazy world.
data.description:
You are in the Main graveyard.
This is an ominous place that a thick fog envelops.  There are rows of primitive gravestones and crosses along with some angelic statues for the more wealthy.  You can hear sobs in the distance as a funeral ceremony is underway.
The thief and the priest are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to stop the thief from robbing the funeral goers.
data.mid_motivation: I have known the thief for many years and I know why he is here. I need to stop him from committing any future atrocities.
data.long_motivation: I want to get the thief some help. I need to

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: go the graveyard to attend the funeral.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the shrub, where the thief is waiting for the funeral to disperse.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: steal gold from the thief. I saw him steal it from my mother.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the road with the thief to speak to him in private about his poor decisions. I tell him I will out him to the entire village.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield a piece of broken gravestone against the thief. The thief is attacking me so I can't tell anyone what I've learned.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: hit the thief and knock him unconscious. I now have explaining to do to the authorities.
